ownership.description: Your leads belong exclusively to you

q0.question: Do I have to show properties?
answer_items: Explanation: Only agents with a RERA license can show properties.
Your role: Just pass on the information (lead) to the agency.
Good news: You have nothing else to do!

q_consent.question: Do I need to ask permission before sharing contact details?
answer_items: The law (GDPR): You CANNOT share someone's personal data without their consent.
In practice: Simply ask "Can I pass your details to a real estate agent?"
If they say YES: Perfect, you can create the lead ✅
If they say NO: Respect their choice, don't share ❌
q_consent.warning: ⚠️ Sharing contact details without permission can result in account closure and legal action.

q1.question: How many leads can I bring?
q1.answer: Unlimited! There's no restriction on the number of leads you can bring. The more qualified clients you bring, the more you increase your earning chances. Some referrers manage 1-2 leads per month, others bring 10+. You decide your level of engagement.

q2.question: Do I need a real estate license?
q2.answer: No! The referrer program is open to everyone, no license required. You don't need any particular real estate knowledge. Your role is simply to connect interested people with our agency. We handle all the legal and technical parts.

q5.question: What happens if the client doesn't buy?
q5.answer: No problem! You don't lose anything. The lead stays in your history and you can continue bringing other clients. There's no financial commitment on your part. You only get paid when a sale or rental is completed. Zero risk for you!
